description: The perfect accompaniment for crackers, wine and veggie sticks.
name: Cheese Log with Crackers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble Spread coating in an even layer on cutting board/parchment lined counter. Remove cheese ball from refrigerator and roll in coating mixture, pressing to adhere, until evenly coated. At this point you can refrigerate until ready to serve.
